page.title: 04SHOPS/POLITICS/FOOD/FAMOUS
page.content: {SHOPS Corner shop,Spa in Danehill,Chelwood Gate,East Grinstead, Nutley, Lewes, Haywards Heath. {POLITICS EAST GRINSTEAD CONSTITUENCY:- Sir Geoffrey Johnson-Smith (Conservative) {FOOD} Milk from wood gate. Mr fairchild sells radishes,onions,broad beans, tomatoes,cucumbers,strawberries, raspberries,blackcurrants,plums, gooseberries,greengages,apples. {FAMOUS PEOPLE Janet Butterworth - stage name Janet Brown - famous for her impressions of Margaret Thatcher (the Prime Minister) lives in Chelwood Gate.
